channel.title: Meed the ipban code
channel.description: need the ipban code so when ya on server you can just put ::ipban

item.title: Meed the ipban code
item.dc:creator: @weaving8 weaving8
item.description:
@weaving8 wrote:

the code is this

if (command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String banned = command.substring(6);
int name = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(banned);
client b = (client) server.playerHandler.players[name];
b.disconnected = true;
appendToIPBanned(b.connectedFrom);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+playerName+" has ip banned ["+b.connectedFrom+"] ("+command.substring(6)+")");
sendMessage("You have ip banned "+command.substring(6)+". Connected From: "+b.connectedFrom+"");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(""+command.substring(6)+" is either offline or name doesnt exist.");
}
BufferedWriter bw = null;
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
bw.write(""+playerName+" IP Banned "+command.substring(6)+"");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage("Error ipbanning user.");
}
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Meed the ipban code
item.dc:creator: @I_can_3_hit I can 3 hit
item.description:
@I_can_3_hit wrote:

Add whatever player rights.

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”)

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourname”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
v.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(“player successfully ip banned”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
}
  }

}[/code]

item.title: Meed the ipban code
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

if (command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String banned = command.substring(6);
int name = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(banned);
client b = (client) server.playerHandler.players[name];
b.disconnected = true;
appendToIPBanned(b.connectedFrom);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+playerName+" has ip banned ["+b.connectedFrom+"] ("+command.substring(6)+")");
sendMessage("You have ip banned "+command.substring(6)+". Connected From: "+b.connectedFrom+"");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(""+command.substring(6)+" is either offline or name doesnt exist.");
}
BufferedWriter bw = null;
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
bw.write(""+playerName+" IP Banned "+command.substring(6)+"");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage("Error ipbanning user.");
}
}
}
